CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISNULL(DMAPP__Account_Political_Map__c), DMAPP__Account_Political_Map__c == ''), 'No Relationship Map', IF (DMAPP__Account_Political_Map__r.DMAPP__Updated_In_Last_90_Days__c, 'Relationship Map Updated in Last 90 Days', 'Relationship Map Not Updated in Last 90 Days'))
CustomField.label: Relationship Map Status
